item.title: [Python] A note on creating a python development environment on macOS Catalina
item.description: *Memo will be updated at any time* Aiming to build a python development environment In the environment I upgraded from Mojave to Catalina, when I did it normally, it did not work as expected with python3 or pip3 due to the difference in version, so I try using pyenv and see if it works. It’s actually better to use Docker, but for now… homebrew Start from here. /bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.

item.title: [Python] Get and create nodes added and updated in new version
item.description: #Introduction This article is the 10th day article of Houdini Advent Calender 2019. Houdini18.0 was released at the end of last month! I think that many people have already used it, but the node introduced in New feature movie Besides, it seems that small updates have been made. Therefore, this article will show you how to get and create the added and updated nodes in Houdini 18.0. #Definition of added and updated nodes

item.title: [Python] How to get help on HDA (with extra Python script)
item.description: This article is the 8th day article of [**Houdini Advent Calender 2019**](https://qiita.com/advent-calendar/2019/houdini). Nowadays, Houdini is used in various industries, and I think various HDAs are being developed by various companies. On the other hand, if management and documentation are not maintained, **you can not understand how to use HDA created by others, and you can not know what kind of HDA exists **. This article will show you how to create tooltips and your own documentation for the parameters shown below.

item.title: [Python] Things from building Python environment to running on Windows
item.description: When building the Python environment, I went through various articles saying "Authentication proxy settings, coexistence environment, and execution confirmation are all necessary", so I think that it would be nice to put them all together. #Introduction Content The contents introduced in this article are as follows. Please skip the authentication proxy and coexistence environment construction if necessary. Install Anaconda (Windows) Authentication proxy settings Different versions coexistence environment construction Run the program in interactive mode Run Python script For whom For Python beginners who meet any of the following:

item.title: [Python] [OpenCV; Python] Summary of findcontours function
item.description: I couldn't find any more detailed explanation about findcontours for Python version of OpenCV on the internet, so I'd like to note that I tried it myself. If you made a mistake, please point it out. #findcontours function When you want to extract the contours of an image with OpenCV, use the function findContours. The first argument is the input image, the second argument is the extraction mode, and the third argument is the approximation method.
